name: street-fighter-micro-fe
description: Choose your character screen built with micro frontends architecture.
author: Rachel Yord√°n <nerdycodeblog@gmail.com> (https://www.nerdycode.com/)

scripts.start: concurrently --names "detail  ,characters ,controls" "mfserve --listen 3001 detail" "mfserve --listen 3002 --cors characters" "mfserve --listen 3003 controls" "wait-on http://localhost:3001/characters/chun-li && opener http://localhost:3001/characters/chun-li"
